bgRemover.subTitle: Our AI-powered tool allows you to seamlessly remove backgrounds from your images with just a few clicks, enhancing your photo editing experience.

upscaler.subTitle: Our Super Resolution tool uses advanced AI to increase the resolution of your photos, enhancing detail and sharpness without losing any information.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Utilizes the latest AI inference engine to ensure rapid processing and quick results.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your data remains yours, we guarantee it will not be used for any other purposes.

simple.title: Simple
simple.description: Easy to use, no need to install anything, just drag and drop your images to get started.

highQuality.title: High Quality
highQuality.description: Utilizes advanced AI to ensure top-notch photo enhancement and editing quality.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Upload an image to get started

addOrDrop: Add or drop your image here
supportImage: Supports JPG, JPEG, PNG or WEBP up to 30MB and 2048x2048
